config.ModEnabled.name: Enable translation
config.ModEnabled.description: Whether or not to enable the British translation. Make sure to select British English as the game's language.
config.GrandparentName.name: Grandparent name
config.GrandparentName.description: Which name to use to refer to your grandparent.
config.PierreShopName.name: Pierre's shop name
config.PierreShopName.description: The name to be used for Pierre's shop (called Pierre's General Store in the US English original).
